original_title: Sworn to the Drum: A Tribute to Francisco Aguabella
overview: When you think of Latin percussion, think of Francisco Aguabella. Perhaps the finest Afro-Cuban master percussionist still living, he has become synonymous with his instrument â€” one of the highest compliments a musician can receive. Indeed, what Carlos Santana is to the guitar, Aguabella is to the conga drum.
title: Sworn to the Drum: A Tribute to Francisco Aguabella
